text: Wid iteppen rrba, ur d pnekkaren siwa am ara d kren win issexbibev Cciian, mi t innul. Ayagi, acku nnan: «ttjara am rrba kan». Oebbi Ieell ttjara, Igdel rrba. Win n tusa lewuaya s$uo Mass is, d$a ixva, ines ayen iaaddan. Lameo is ar Oebbi. Wid iu$alen, widak d at tmes, nitni, degs, ad wekkoen
